name: 2020 Nagoya APCBSS Asia-Pacific Conference on Business & Social Science
content: Asia-Pacific Conference on Business & Social Science (APCBSS) is an international platform for scholars, researchers and practitioners to discuss in following topics, but are not limited to: Business and Management, Communication, Economics, Education, Finance, Humanities and Culture Studies, Law and Politics, Psychology and Social Studies. APCBSS 2020 will take place from January 20-22, 2020 in Nagoya, Japan. Prospective authors are invited to submit research abstracts or full papers. Audiences are also welcome to join the conference for research and opinions exchanging. APCBSS aims to bring together leading academic scholars and researchers to share and exchange their research results and experiences on all aspects of Business and Social Science. It also provides an interdisciplinary platform for policy makers, top managers, researchers, practitioners and educators to present and discuss the most recent innovations, trends, and concerns as well as practical challenges encountered and solutions adopted in the fields of Business and Social Science. Contact Us: apcbss@apcbss.org
